articles.author: Sankalp Phartiyal
articles.title: Tata Plans New iPhone Factory in India to Help Apple Diversify Beyond China - Bloomberg
articles.description: Conglomerate Tata Group plans to build one of India’s biggest iPhone assembly plants, tapping Apple Inc.’s ambitions to increase manufacturing in the South Asian country.
articles.content:
